RecordAlertDataSource.name: RecordAlertDataSource
RecordAlertDataSource.description: Represents an internal or external source for record alert data.

ApexClassId.description: An Apex class to be used as the data source.

DeveloperName.description: A unique name of a record alert data source.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the record alert data source is active.

Language.description: The language of the record alert data source.

MasterLabel.description: A unique name of a record alert data source.

NamespacePrefix.description: A namespace prefix associated with this object.

Type.description: Specifies the type of active data source that's used to retrieve a record alert.
